name: Fire-Fighting Wizard Pet Rescue Roguelike
description:
Cast spells to fight fires and rescue pets in this roguelike tactical-strategy RPG

10 spells to learn and upgrade, 7 scrolls to read, 4 pet types to rescue

This is Fine.

Goal

Make it through all 10 burning houses and save the most pets to graduate from fire academy

Story

You are a recent graduate of Waterwarks School for Magically Talented Youth.

With your new water-based magic, you applied to become a firefighter specializing in rescuing pets.

Not wanting to wait any longer, you dive into the nearest rift towards a burning building...

How to Play

This game is turn-based, so the fires only advance after you move. Take your time to think through your options.

Controls

Mouse, keyboard, and gamepad fully supported

WASD / Arrow keys / Numpad
u: upgrade spells
c/z: cast spells
i: open inventory
esc: exit menus / cancel
m: show messages

To enter look mode, cast the free look spell

Gamepad controls
D-pad : move
A / X : select
B / Circle : cancel
X / Square : open menu
Y / Triangle : cast spell
Left Bumper : open inventory
Right Bumper : cast spell

Tips
* Scrolls are randomized each playthrough, don't forget to use them in your inventory
* Try to use time as efficiently as possible 
* Each pet behaves differently
* Fire spreads when the fire timer reaches zero
* You can bash through walls, but be careful as this damages the house
* Find a source of water to replenish spells! The only source of water in a burning house is the toilet
* There are three spell points to collect on each level
* Health is a scarce resource but can be recovered with the correct scroll
* You can move into fire to melee-attack it
* Small fires can't hurt you until they grow
